resume_text: Currently in training in Web Development, with solid knowledge in HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I have already completed fundamental front-end modules, including programming logic, API consumption with Fetch and DOM manipulation. I have knowledge in Automated Testing with Jest and development with React, including the use of Context API. I also have experience with TailwindCSS and TypeScript, expanding my skills to build modern, scalable and well-structured applications. I am a dedicated, proactive and creative person, with ease to work in a team and solve problems. I am looking for my first opportunity as a junior front-end developer to apply my knowledge, collaborate on real projects and continue to grow technically and professionally.
education_items: Centro de Ensino Educare - High School - Jan/2018 - Dec/2019
courses_items: Dev Quest - Dev em Dobro - Front-End Web Development - Apr/2025 - ongoing

project_descriptions.mini_ats: A mini system for managing job applications, built with React + TypeScript, allowing you to add, edit, remove and filter jobs.
project_descriptions.admin_dashboard: A modern and responsive admin panel built with React + Vite, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. Includes user management, saved browser settings and metrics visualization.
project_descriptions.analisador_gemini: This project is a code analyzer powered by Google Gemini API. Built with React + Vite.
project_descriptions.search_github: Search the GitHub API for a user and return their information such as name, bio, profile image and repositories.
project_descriptions.pokemon_explorer: React+Vite application to list and explore Pokémon using the PokéAPI.
project_descriptions.doce_encanto: A modern and responsive website for the fictional bakery Doce Encanto, developed with React + Vite, focused on user experience and attractive design.
